Package gui

Class DesignSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.DesignSystem
  • public final class DesignSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Design System completo per l'applicazione Hackathon Manager Implementa un design moderno, consistente e professionale Ispirato a Material Design 3 e Fluent UI
